period.item: Vox Mobili, software publisher, Paris, France.
Android development on the Phonebook 2.0 application (synchronized and social address book.)
Designed and implemented a generic engine that integrates with social networks (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, MySpace, ...) and managed developers implementing connectors using this engine.
Implemented presence / chat features using the RCS protocol.
Server-side development on the PIM product (synchronized address book, calendar, tasks, pictures / videos, etc.)
Customized the software for customers: T-Mobile, Bouygues Telecom, Orange, Telstra.
period.environment: Android, Java, J2EE (JSP/Servlets/Taglibs), Tiles, Javascript, Ajax, JSON, SOAP, Axis, LDAP, SyncML, Oracle, Tomcat, Subversion, Eclipse.

period.item: Oalia, software publisher, Suresnes, France.
Maintained and enhanced the in-house Framework.
Development on the OSRM / OSPM v3 and v4 products (spend management software.)
Designed and implemented the Supplier Portal module (remote application communicating using Web Services.)
period.environment: Java, J2EE, Hibernate, Turbine, Velocity, Ajax, SOAP, Axis, Oracle, Tomcat, Weblogic, Subversion, Maven, Eclipse.

period.item: Pegasis, IT services company and software publisher, Paris, France.
Development on web applications (internet/intranet) for customers: France Télécom, l'Apec, Casino, Le Mémorial de la Shoah, Planète TP.
Used Pegasis' internal framework (MVC2 model) and Délia CMS.
period.environment: Java, J2EE (JSP/Servlets/Taglibs), Tiles, SQL, Oracle, CVS, Tomcat, Ant, IntelliJ, Eclipse.

period.item: Icom Informatique, software publisher, Charenton, France.
Development on products and components (connectivity and revamping of mainframe applications.)
Designed and developed a client side administration module for the WMA Open Server product.
Ported a proprietary scripting language to Java.
period.environment: Java, JSP/Servlets, Applets, Swing, Java web start, JavaCC, XML, LDAP, SSL, Visual SourceSafe, Ant, IntelliJ.

period.item: Aston, IT services company, Vélizy, France.
6 months internship at Accor Services: study and evaluation of open systems for smartcards and development of prototypes.
period.environment: Java, JavaCard, OpenCard Platform, Rational Rose, JBuilder, Gemplus GemXPresso.

category.name: Development
category.item: Excellent knowledge of the Java language.
Very good knowledge of the Android platform.
Good knowledge of C++, C, C#, Ada and Pascal languages.
Other skills: Shell, Perl, TCL, assembly language.

category.name: Web
category.item: Very good knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript, XML, XSL/T, Ajax.
Other skills: Applets, Velocity, FreeMarker, PHP, Flash.

category.name: Databases
category.item: SQL language; Oracle, MySQL and DB2.

category.name: Operating Systems
category.item: Good knowledge of Linux / Unix; Windows; DOS.

period.item: Microsoft certified .NET and C# training (MS-2349, one week.)
Computer science at EPITA (Ecole Pour l'Informatique et les Techniques Avancées), Paris, France.
Information Systems / Software Engineering option.
Team project: project documentation management system (Workflow), Visual J++ environment.
D.U.T. informatique (Diplôme Universitaire Technologique in computer science), Software Engineering option, at I.U.T. of Vélizy, France.
Final project: ported an educational software package to Windows 9x/NT (Delphi environment.)
Baccalauréat, Science series, Mathematics option.

misc.item: Reading (science, science-fiction), music (bass guitar), cinema, video games, roller-blading.
